text: Øivind Berg (born 23 March 1946) is a Norwegian ice hockey player. He was born in Oslo and represented the club IF Frisk Asker. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in Sapporo in 1972, where the Norwegian team placed 8th. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Øivind Berg
